Can I use the `getcurrencyconverters` API to retrieve all currencies, regardless of their reserve amounts or ratios?

No, you cannot. The `getcurrencyconverters` API has specific filters in place to only return currencies that meet certain criteria, such as having at least 1000 VRSC in reserve and a reserve ratio greater than 10%. It does not return all currencies, unlike what you assumed.

ueries
The `getcurrencyconverters` API retrieves all currencies that have at least 1000 VRSC in reserve, are greater than 10% VRSC reserve ratio, and have all listed currencies as reserves
- **E.g. BTC ETH:**
  ```
  verus -chain=VRSCTEST getcurrencyconverters btc eth
  ```
  Will return all currencies that have btc/eth markets at or above the liquidity threshold.
